summary: * editline: renamed to libedit (which seems to be the proper name for   the package). * Removed the old ghc-wrapper, which hasn't been used for a long time. * Renamed the "boot" GHC to "binary", which is more descriptive.   (They *can* be used for other things than bootstrapping a GHC   source build.) * Updated the GHC 6.10.1 binary to 6.10.2.
